level.heading: AGREEMENTS WITH PARTICIPATING SERVICE DELIVERERS (ยง 7-804)

level.text: Participating service deliverers shall enter into formal written agreements with the Director to provide employment and training.
The agreement shall contain an assurance by the service deliverer that only eligible individuals referred by the Department will receive training as approved by the Director.

The agreement shall also provide a detailed work statement which describes the service deliverer’s training objectives, curriculum, and benefits to be acquired by the program participants as a direct result of the training received.
Participating service deliverers who administer training and retraining programs will be responsible for meeting the performance standards as specified in their contract or agreement.
Service deliverers shall adhere to all directives that relate to fraud and abuse as set forth in D.C. laws, rules, and written agreements.
Service deliverers shall agree to submit properly certified reports as required to the Director.
Service deliverers shall comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

level.heading: SOURCE
